title: Effect of increase in nominal income

content.question: If there is an increase in nominal income, which of the following will most likely occur in the short run?

choices.label: The supply of money will decrease.
The supply of money will increase.
The demand for money will increase.
The demand for money will decrease.
There will be no impact on the money market.

content.answer: The demand for money will increase.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
